review: Love the Fire Stick. It makes any TV a "smart" TV!
author: Cindy L Barry

review: very pleased. does everything it was advertised to do.
author: Donna L. Prusak

review: I love my amazon fire stick!!! Very easy to use and hook up!!!
author: Latish

review: The Fire TV stick is awesome! It's easy to use and we can watch all our favorite shows and movies. We love it so much we cancelled our cable service.
author: Heather J Harrison

review: It works all the time. Prime movies are included BUT they are not all free.  I subscribe to Netflix because all of theirs ARE free with the monthly subscription and I don't waste my time browsing, finding a film I want to watch and then finding out It costs to watch it. I am subscribed to Amazon Prime and I think I should get more new movies with the Fire Stick. Oh well, lesson learned.
author: Jean B.

review: great device,  meets all my streaming needs
author: Henry Williams
